message:
Hi Peter,

I am Shirley, and I am glad to find your blog via google. I must say this is the best easy-to-understand article about grow lights I have seen.  Love it!

I am one of the bloggers for a grow light company, and I always explain those measurements to our customers in an easy way because most of them are not technical.

So, are you interested in adding one of our grow lights to this article and having a short review?

[https://cultiuana.com/products/1000-watt-led-grow-light](https://cultiuana.com/products/1000-watt-led-grow-light)

Cheers.
